sorcer.core.provider.cataloger
Class ServiceCataloger

java.lang.Object
  sorcer.core.provider.ServiceProvider
      sorcer.core.provider.cataloger.ServiceCataloger
All Implemented Interfaces:
DestroyAdmin, LifeCycle, Remote, EventListener, Administrable, JoinAdmin, RemoteMethodControl, ProxyAccessor, ReferentUuid, ServiceIDListener, ServerProxyTrust, AdministratableProvider, Cataloger, ContextManagement, RemoteContextManagement, Monitorable, Provider, Outer, Partner, Partnership, SorcerConstants, Identifiable, Service
public class ServiceCataloger
extends ServiceProvider
implements Cataloger, AdministratableProvider

The facility for maintaining a cache of all SORCER OS :: providers Service s as specified by provider.template.match=sorcer.service.Service in the sorcer.env configuration file.

  • It uses ServiceDiscoveryManager with lookup cache.
  • It uses an internal hash map for storing services called ServiceCataloger.CatalogerInfo
  • The key of the map is an InterfaceList, the value is the vector of service proxies
  • InterfaceList is a list of interfaces with equals overridden such that for (interfaceList1.equals(interfaceList2) returns true if all elements contained in interfaceList2 are contained in interfaceList1.
  • get and put method of ServiceCataloger.CatalogerInfo are overridden to do nothing.

Only access to ServiceCataloger.CatalogerInfo is via a set of "service-aware" methods. They include

  1. addServiceItem(SeviceItem): adds an entry to this hash map such that the key is the InterfaceList describing the service. value is the serviceItem itself. Value is added always to the first to improve load balancing heuristics (assuming that the latest served service is always removed and added to the end
  2. getServiceItem(String[] interfaces), String providerName)): not only returns the serviceItem with the following specs, but also removes and adds the sericeItem to the end of the list to provide load-balancing
  3. synchronized getServiceItem(ServiceID serviceID) returns a service with a serviceID, with the same load-balancing feature mentioned above
  4. )getServiceMethods()) returns a hash map with the key as a service interface (those interfaces package name starting with sorcer.) and its value is a list of interface's method names.
  5. )getMethodContext(providerName, methodName)) returns the template dataContext with which the provider is registered. This template dataContext is pulled out of the service attribute (Entry): SorcerServiceInfo.

lookupItem

public ServiceItem lookupItem(String providerName,
                              Class... serviceTypes)
                       throws RemoteException
Returns a Jini ServiceItem containing SORCER service provider based on two entries provided. The first entry is a provider's service type, the second provider's name. Expected that more entries will be needed to identify a provider in the future. See also lookup for a given ServiceID.

Specified by:
lookupItem in interface Cataloger
Parameters:
providerName - - a provider name, a friendy provider's ID.
Returns:
ServiceItem
Throws:
RemoteException
See Also:
Cataloger.lookup(Class[])

getMainUIDescriptor

public UIDescriptor getMainUIDescriptor()
Returns a service UI descriptor for a Cataloger UI. The interface presents provider's interfaces of discovered services along with associated contexts per defined interface or individual interface method.

Overrides:
getMainUIDescriptor in class ServiceProvider
Returns:
an UI descriptor for your provider. null if not overwritten in subclasses.
See Also:
ServiceProvider.getMainUIDescriptor()

lookup

public Object lookup(ServiceTemplate tmpl)
              throws RemoteException
Returns the service Provider from an item matching the template, or null if there is no match. If multiple items match the template, it is arbitrary as to which service object is returned. If the returned object cannot be deserialized, an UnmarshalException is thrown with the standard RMI semantics.

Specified by:
lookup in interface Cataloger
Parameters:
tmpl - - the template to match
Returns:
an object that represents a service that matches the specified template
Throws:
RemoteException

lookup

public ServiceMatches lookup(ServiceTemplate tmpl,
                             int maxMatches)
                      throws RemoteException
Returns at most maxMatches items matching the template, plus the total number of items that match the template. The return value is never null, and the returned items array is only null if maxMatches is zero. For each returned item, if the service object cannot be deserialized, the service field of the item is set to null and no exception is thrown. Similarly, if an attribute set cannot be deserialized, that element of the attributeSets array is set to null and no exception is thrown.

Specified by:
lookup in interface Cataloger
Parameters:
tmpl - - the template to match
maxMatches -
Returns:
a ServiceMatches instance that contains at most maxMatches items matching the template, plus the total number of items that match the template. The return value is never null, and the returned items array is only null if maxMatches is zero.
Throws:
RemoteException
